title: Atikamekw - Mark (Book)
description: An Atikamekw translation of the Gospel of Mark translated by Wycliffe. Atikamekw is a dialect of Cree, an indigenous language of North America.

language.name: Atikamekw
language.area: South central Quebec, between La Tuque, Quebec, and Senneterre, Quebec, 200â€“400 kms. north of Montreal, along the upper reaches of St. Maurice River, 3 isolated communities on reservations of Manuane, Obedjiwan, Weymontachie.
